law.catch_line: Except for purposes of a criminal prosecution, if the Attorney General believes that a person is in ...
law.text: Except for purposes of a criminal prosecution, if the Attorney General believes that a person is in possession, custody or control of any documents relevant to the subject matter of an investigation of a possible violation of this subtitle, he may demand and obtain the production of these documents in the manner provided for by § 11-205 of this article.
